alert.note: Alert for Broward; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:10PM EDT until August 29 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Broward County in southeastern Florida... Central Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 609 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Okeelanta to near Loxahatchee NWR to Deerfield Beach, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Coral Springs, West Palm Beach, Pompano Beach and Boca Raton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
